name: prometheus
description: Prometheus is a monitoring system and time series database.
values:
## Configuration for the main Prometheus server
##
server:
  enabled: true
  name: server
  image:
    registry: quay.io
    repository: prometheus/prometheus
    tag: "v2.53.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent

  ## Prometheus server ConfigMap entries
  ##
  configMap:
    enabled: true

  ## Configuration for the server's persistent volume
  ##
  persistentVolume:
    enabled: true
    size: 8Gi
    storageClass: ""
    accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce

  ## Resources for the Prometheus server
  ##
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
